overview.title: Combat Mechanics Guide
overview.purpose: Understanding how damage is calculated in WoS for optimal hero/troop investment

damage_formula.basic_formula: Kills = sqrt(Troops) * (Attack * Lethality) / (Enemy Defense * Enemy Health) * SkillModifier

troops.description: Number of troops in the march
troops.note: Square root means doubling troops only increases damage by ~41%
troops.optimization: Troop count has diminishing returns - focus on quality over quantity

attack.description: Total attack stat from troops, heroes, gear, research, buffs

health.note: Higher health = more damage needed to kill

skill_modifier.description: Multiplier from hero expedition skills in combat
skill_modifier.note: Only leftmost hero's expedition skill applies when joining rallies

class_counters.optimization: Match your composition to counter enemy's primary class

rally_formation.note: Rally leader sets the formation, joiners add troops proportionally
rally_formation.tip: Coordinate with rally leader on intended composition

rally_capacity.scaling: More troops = more damage but diminishing returns

joiner_mechanics.critical_rule: ONLY the leftmost hero's expedition skill (top-right skill) applies

best_attack_joiners.why: Affects all damage types including skills and pets

joiner_mechanics.common_mistake: Using wrong hero in leftmost slot - their expedition skill is wasted

rally_leader.importance: Sets march composition and contributes their full hero lineup

march_capacity.optimization: Higher capacity = more troops = more power, but diminishing returns on damage

troop_tiers.importance: Higher tier troops have better base stats
troop_tiers.optimization: Always train highest available tier. Promote lower tiers when possible.

exploration_skills.when_used: PvE content - Bear Trap, Crazy Joe, Labyrinth, Intel Missions
exploration_skills.what_matters: All 4 exploration skills of your 5 heroes

expedition_skills.when_used: PvP combat - SvS, rallies, city attacks
expedition_skills.what_matters: Only leftmost hero's top-right skill when joining rallies
expedition_skills.full_use: Rally leader uses all expedition skills

hero_skills_in_combat.critical_understanding: Don't upgrade expedition skills for rally joiners (except leftmost hero)

power_calculation.note: Power is a rough indicator but combat effectiveness depends on composition and skills

for_svs_attack: Focus on troop tier over quantity
Upgrade chief gear for attack stats
